author: jleroux
msg: Trying to upgrade javamail (mail.jar) from 1.4 (our version) to 1.4.5 from Oracle I discovered that it's now distributed under BCL license (Binary Code License) which is not an open source license hence can't be committed.
So we are stuck with the 1.4 version wich is ok I guess and users should upgrade by themself...
